LanguageData.RC2_FruitWine.label: fruit wine
LanguageData.RC2_FruitWine.description: A broad term for wine made from any kind of fruit (including a mixture of fruits), fruit wine is less popular than grape wine but still quite good and comes in a wide variety of flavors.
LanguageData.RC2_FruitWine.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.RC2_FruitWine.tools.1.label: neck
